item.title: EZVIZ introduces new action cameras
item.description: Source: EZVIZ. The FIVE action cam. EZVIZ, a company specializing in Wi-Fi cloud cameras and video surveillance equipment, will introduce a new action camera series at CES 2016, designed for sports enthusiasts and content creators. Priced at US$299.99, the EZVIZ FIVE action camera boasts an Ambarella A12 chipset, a built-in 2-inch IPS touchscreen with 320x240 resolution, a 900mAh battery, and the capability to record continuously at 4K resolution at 15 frames per second.
